module.name: mcs
module.required: Contains attributes used in MCS policy.

interface.name: mcs_killall
interface.summary: This domain is allowed to sigkill and sigstop all domains regardless of their MCS category set.

interface.name: mcs_ptrace_all
interface.summary: This domain is allowed to ptrace all domains regardless of their MCS category set.

interface.name: mcs_process_set_categories
interface.summary: Make specified domain MCS trusted for setting any category set for the processes it executes.
